languages.text: "Удивительное везение — быть персональным врагом столь влиятельного ксеноса, столько раз подвергнуться ее атакам, но остаться в живых. Настолько удивительное, что поневоле задумаешься — а не разыгрывают ли для тебя спектакль? И не являются ли все эти зрелищные мясорубки своеобразным алиби, призванным раз и навсегда зарекомендовать вас как врага ксеносов, но никоим образом не союзника или даже агента?"

"Such remarkable luck — to be a personal enemy of such an influential xenos, to have been attacked so many times, and yet make it out alive. So remarkable that one has to wonder — am I watching a spectacle? Could all these thrilling massacres be an alibi of sorts, meant to establish you once and for all as an enemy of the xenos and never their ally or even their agent?"
languages.original_text: "Удивительное везение — быть персональным врагом столь влиятельного ксеноса, столько раз подвергнуться ее атакам, но остаться в живых. Настолько удивительное, что поневоле задумаешься — а не разыгрывают ли для тебя спектакль? И не являются ли все эти зрелищные мясорубки своеобразным алиби, призванным раз и навсегда зарекомендовать вас как врага ксеносов, но никоим образом не союзника или даже агента?"

"Such remarkable luck — to be a personal enemy of such an influential xenos, to have been attacked so many times, and yet make it out alive. So remarkable that one has to wonder — am I watching a spectacle? Could all these thrilling massacres be an alibi of sorts, meant to establish you once and for all as an enemy of the xenos and never their ally or even their agent?"

languages.text: 「これほど非凡な幸運…あれほど影響力のある異種族と個人で敵対し、度重なる襲撃を受け、まだ生き延びているのだ。そこまで見事な能力には疑問も生じるというもの。私は奇跡でも見ているのか、と。こうした戦慄する殺戮を生き延びるには、何らかのアリバイが存在するもの。もしや、異種族の敵もしくはその手先と永久同盟を結ぶつもりなのではないか？」
languages.original_text: "Such remarkable luck — to be a personal enemy of such an influential xenos, to have been attacked so many times, and yet make it out alive. So remarkable that one has to wonder — am I watching a spectacle? Could all these thrilling massacres be an alibi of sorts, meant to establish you once and for all as an enemy of the xenos and never their ally or even their agent?"

traits.locale_text: 「これほど非凡な幸運…あれほど影響力のある異種族と個人で敵対し、度重なる襲撃を受け、まだ生き延びているのだ。そこまで見事な能力には疑問も生じるというもの。私は奇跡でも見ているのか、と。こうした戦慄する殺戮を生き延びるには、何らかのアリバイが存在するもの。もしや、異種族の敵もしくはその手先と永久同盟を結ぶつもりなのではないか？」

languages.original_text: "Such remarkable luck — to be a personal enemy of such an influential xenos, to have been attacked so many times, and yet make it out alive. So remarkable that one has to wonder — am I watching a spectacle? Could all these thrilling massacres be an alibi of sorts, meant to establish you once and for all as an enemy of the xenos and never their ally or even their agent?"

languages.text: “你的运气好得令人吃惊。你面对着这么强大的异形，遭受了他这么多次攻击，却每次都能存活下来。这不得不让人怀疑，这莫非是你们联手出演的一场苦肉计？所有这些惊险的屠杀，莫非都是为了营造一种假象，让所有人都深信你是异形的死敌，不可能成为他们的盟友或代理人？”
languages.original_text: "Such remarkable luck — to be a personal enemy of such an influential xenos, to have been attacked so many times, and yet make it out alive. So remarkable that one has to wonder — am I watching a spectacle? Could all these thrilling massacres be an alibi of sorts, meant to establish you once and for all as an enemy of the xenos and never their ally or even their agent?"

traits.locale_text: “你的运气好得令人吃惊。你面对着这么强大的异形，遭受了他这么多次攻击，却每次都能存活下来。这不得不让人怀疑，这莫非是你们联手出演的一场苦肉计？所有这些惊险的屠杀，莫非都是为了营造一种假象，让所有人都深信你是异形的死敌，不可能成为他们的盟友或代理人？”

languages.text: «Es una suerte notable: a pesar de ganarse la enemistad personal de un xenos tan influyente y de haber sufrido tantos ataques, sigue viv{mf|o|a}. Es tan notable como para que me pregunte si es todo una representación. ¿Es posible que todas estas masacres sean una coartada para establecerle definitivamente como enemig{mf|o|a} de los xenos y no su aliad{mf|o|a} o incluso su agente?».
languages.original_text: "Such remarkable luck — to be a personal enemy of such an influential xenos, to have been attacked so many times, and yet make it out alive. So remarkable that one has to wonder — am I watching a spectacle? Could all these thrilling massacres be an alibi of sorts, meant to establish you once and for all as an enemy of the xenos and never their ally or even their agent?"

traits.locale_text: «Es una suerte notable: a pesar de ganarse la enemistad personal de un xenos tan influyente y de haber sufrido tantos ataques, sigue viv{mf|o|a}. Es tan notable como para que me pregunte si es todo una representación. ¿Es posible que todas estas masacres sean una coartada para establecerle definitivamente como enemig{mf|o|a} de los xenos y no su aliad{mf|o|a} o incluso su agente?».

languages.text: « Quelle chance insolente ! Je doute que quiconque puisse se targuer d'avoir survécu à autant d'attaques orchestrées par une xénos dotée d'une telle influence. C'est d'ailleurs tellement incroyable que je ne peux m'empêcher de me demander si je ne serais pas en train d'assister à un spectacle bien ficelé. Se pourrait-il que tous ces massacres ne soient qu'un alibi destiné à vous faire valoir comme {mf|ennemi juré|ennemie jurée} des xénos plutôt que comme leur {mf|allié|alliée}... ou même leur {mf|agent|agente} ? »
languages.original_text: "Such remarkable luck — to be a personal enemy of such an influential xenos, to have been attacked so many times, and yet make it out alive. So remarkable that one has to wonder — am I watching a spectacle? Could all these thrilling massacres be an alibi of sorts, meant to establish you once and for all as an enemy of the xenos and never their ally or even their agent?"

traits.locale_text: « Quelle chance insolente ! Je doute que quiconque puisse se targuer d'avoir survécu à autant d'attaques orchestrées par une xénos dotée d'une telle influence. C'est d'ailleurs tellement incroyable que je ne peux m'empêcher de me demander si je ne serais pas en train d'assister à un spectacle bien ficelé. Se pourrait-il que tous ces massacres ne soient qu'un alibi destiné à vous faire valoir comme {mf|ennemi juré|ennemie jurée} des xénos plutôt que comme leur {mf|allié|alliée}... ou même leur {mf|agent|agente} ? »

languages.text: "Ein bemerkenswertes Glück – {mf|persönlicher Feind|persönliche Feindin} einer so einflussreichen Xenos, so viele Angriffe und trotzdem noch am Leben. So bemerkenswert, dass sich eine Frage aufdrängt – bin ich nur Zuschauer einer Vorführung? Könnten all diese spannenden Massaker nur eine Art Alibi sein, um Euch ein für alle Mal als {mf|Feind|Feindin} der Xenos zu etablieren und niemals als {mf|Verbündeter oder gar Agent|Verbündete oder gar Agentin}?"
languages.original_text: "Such remarkable luck — to be a personal enemy of such an influential xenos, to have been attacked so many times, and yet make it out alive. So remarkable that one has to wonder — am I watching a spectacle? Could all these thrilling massacres be an alibi of sorts, meant to establish you once and for all as an enemy of the xenos and never their ally or even their agent?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein bemerkenswertes Glück – {mf|persönlicher Feind|persönliche Feindin} einer so einflussreichen Xenos, so viele Angriffe und trotzdem noch am Leben. So bemerkenswert, dass sich eine Frage aufdrängt – bin ich nur Zuschauer einer Vorführung? Könnten all diese spannenden Massaker nur eine Art Alibi sein, um Euch ein für alle Mal als {mf|Feind|Feindin} der Xenos zu etablieren und niemals als {mf|Verbündeter oder gar Agent|Verbündete oder gar Agentin}?"

languages.text: "Muazzam bir şans. Bu kadar büyük nüfuz sahibi zenoların bizzat düşmanı olmak, tekrar tekrar saldırıya uğramak ama sağ kurtulmak. O kadar muazzam ki insan merak etmeden edemiyor: Piyes mi izliyorum? Bütün bu korkunç katliamlar; seni zenoların düşmanı olarak tanıtacak, onların müttefiki ve hatta ajanı olmanı akıllara bile getirmeyecek bir düzmece olabilir mi?"
languages.original_text: "Such remarkable luck — to be a personal enemy of such an influential xenos, to have been attacked so many times, and yet make it out alive. So remarkable that one has to wonder — am I watching a spectacle? Could all these thrilling massacres be an alibi of sorts, meant to establish you once and for all as an enemy of the xenos and never their ally or even their agent?"

traits.locale_text: "Muazzam bir şans. Bu kadar büyük nüfuz sahibi zenoların bizzat düşmanı hâline gelmek, tekrar tekrar saldırıya uğramak ve sonunda hayatta kalmak. O kadar muazzam ki insan merak etmeden edemiyor: Bir piyes mi izliyorum? Bütün bu korkunç katliamlar seni zenoların düşmanı olarak tanıtacak, onların müttefiki ve hatta ajanı olmanı akıllara bile getirmeyecek bir düzmece olabilir mi?"
